name: Avalanche
printed_effect:
Each player sends the top 3 cards from
their deck to their Underworld.
Then if you control a {frost}-Enchanted Elestral
you can send an additional 2 cards
from your deck to your Underworld.
effect: Each player sends the top 3 cards from their deck to their Underworld. Then if you control a {frost}-Enchanted Elestral you may send an additional 2 cards from the top of your deck to your Underworld.
